programme.title: Squalo deixa Giorno fora de combate. Narancia usa a habilidade de radar de seu Stand Aerosmith para localizar e destruir a ameaça que se aproxima.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para investigar o passado do chefe, Bucciarati e sua equipe embarcam para a Sardenha, mas um estranho usuário de Stand aparece antes da decolagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Sozinha na cabine e sob ataque, Trish recebe a ajuda repentina de uma entidade que se autodenomina Spicy Lady, seu próprio Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Decidido a identificar seu chefe, Abbacchio ativa seu Stand para revelar quem fotografou a mãe de Trish 15 anos antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Sob um céu que pode desabar a qualquer momento

programme.title: Depois de receber uma informação anônima sobre a identidade do chefe e como derrotá-lo, Bucciarati e sua equipe vão a Roma encontrar a pessoa que fez a ligação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para fugir do Stand carnívoro de Cioccolata, Green Tea, Bucciarati e Mista tentam arrumar um carro, mas Secco está determinado a impedir a fuga.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Cioccolata tenta eliminar civis inocentes com seu Stand usando um helicóptero, mas Giorno e Mista decidem derrubá-lo antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Dragão Dourado, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Os novos amigos Josh e Ling visitam seus respectivos pais em uma escavação arqueológica na China, onde descobrirão um mundo fantástico de aventura.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa após lutar contra o Império Romano. Seu filho ilegítimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: O Dragão Dourado, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Os novos amigos Josh e Ling visitam seus respectivos pais em uma escavação arqueológica na China, onde descobrirão um mundo fantástico de aventura.

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovão, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: O inescrupuloso Loki escapou de Asgard e está à procura de Yggdrasil, a árvore que contém toda a força do universo. Ele planeja destruí-la e replantá-la à sua imagem e semelhança.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: The Skull, (1965, Thriller)
programme.desc: The skull of the Marquis de Sade has been taken from its grave, bringing terror to those who own it. Demonologist Christopher Maitland is eager to add the piece to his occult collection.

programme.title: White Zombie, (1932, Zombies)
programme.desc: Watch Bela Lugosi use his special zombie grip to make beautiful women submit to his every desire! In this low budget screamer, a couple honeymooning in Haiti run afoul of a diabolical voodoo master. They're soon wishing they'd gone to Cancun!

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Buccaneer, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: General Andrew Jackson's dependence on the help of pirate Jean Lafitte to repel the British is complicated by the Governor's daughter. Set in New Orleans during the War of 1812.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Action)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Killer Elite, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For most families, moving is a new beginning. But for the Creeds, it could be the beginning of the end. Because they've just moved in next door to a place that children built with broken dreams, the Pet Sematary.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: RUN, (2025, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After leaving her fiancé at the altar, Melissa joins friends at a cabin. When Jenny is found mutilated in the woods and aliens attack the nation, the girls must fight to survive.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: An inspirational account of basketball coach Ken Carter, who received both praise and criticism when he made headlines for benching his entire undefeated team for poor academic performance.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Ma Yuan, a railroad worker and his group of freedom fighters find themselves on the wrong side of the tracks when they decide to ambush a heavily armed military train filled with desperately needed provisions.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In this fantastical action film, martial arts legend Jackie Chan stars as a police inspector tracking down a deranged villain who is out to kidnap his daughter.

programme.title: Hitman [English-Language Version], (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.

programme.title: The Swordsman, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: After being blinded in a coup against the king, Joseon’s greatest swordsman goes into hiding, far removed from his city’s anguish. But when traffickers kidnap his daughter, he has no choice but to unsheathe his sword once more.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves makes his directorial debut in this explosive martial arts drama that reunites him with legendary Matrix Trilogy fight choreographer Yuen Wo Ping and stuntman Tiger Chen.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.desc: Valentin (Eugenio Derbez) is Acapulco’s resident playboy until his life gets turned upside down when a former fling leaves a baby girl on his doorstep.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith — a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) is successful and has the perfect family, but he dreads one event each year: the annual visit of his twin sister Jill (also Adam Sandler). Things spin out of control when Jill decides to extend her visit, permanently!

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: After Nicholas' father dies and leaves the Familyy penniless, the Nickleby Family moves to London to stay with their Uncle Ralph. Ralph turns abusive and separates the family.

programme.title: Elvis And Annabelle, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Anabelle is a small town beauty on the road to being crowned the Miss Texas Rose title, when she tragically dies and on stage due to an eating disorder.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Romance)

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Personal Velocity, (2002, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Three women's escapes from their afflicted lives. Each struggles to flee from the men who confine their personal freedom.

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: American Hustle, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: The con is on when scam artists and lovers Irving Rosenfeld and Sydney Prosser are entrapped by ambitious FBI agent Richie DiMaso and coerced into participating in a sting operation that hinges on snaring politician Carmine Polito and his associates.

programme.title: Billy the Kid, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter kills a member of an outlaw gang, all Hell breaks loose in this shoot-‘em-up tale of gun smoke and justice in the Old West.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Day of the Outlaw, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Two rival cattlemen forget their differences to fight six outlaws who take over the isolated Western town.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Come join The Addams Family for the most hilarious scarefest of this season or any other! When long-lost Uncle Fester reappears after twenty-five years in the Bermuda Triangle, Gomez and Morticia plan a celebration to wake the dead.

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: The family’s future grows bleak when the no-good nanny marries Fester and has the kids shipped off to summer camp. But Wednesday still has a Thing or two up her sleeve.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Comedy)

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Twilight, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Screen legend Paul Newman heads a luminous cast in this acclaimed whodunit packed with stars and suspense.

programme.title: Shottas, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Two young men from Jamaica climb to the top of the criminal world in Miami, with a constant presence of drugs, extortion, and deceit.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

programme.title: The Killer [Cantonese-Language Version], (1989, Action)
programme.desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

programme.title: Contract Killer, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.

programme.title: Warrior, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A thrilling misadventure involving three ingenious orphans and a villainous actor named Count Olaf (Jim Carrey) who wants their enormous fortune.

programme.title: Rango, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

programme.title: The Adventures of SharkBoy and Lavagirl, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From Robert Rodriguez, the director of the SPY KIDS franchise comes another superhero adventure for the entire family. This is the extraordinary tale of a girl with the force of a volcano who teams up with a boy raised by Great White sharks.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: The Man Who Fell To Earth, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: The Davy Back Fight begins with a treacherous Donut Race around Ling Ring Long Land! The Straw Hats square off against the Foxy Pirates in a battle to see who loses a crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 1! One lap of the donut race!

programme.title: Nami uses her considerable skill as a navigator to put the Straw Hats on the verge of victory, but the captain of the Foxy Pirates has more than a few dirty tricks up his sleeve!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Silver fox foxy! The merciless interference!

programme.title: Thanks to some foxy sabotage, Chopper has been lost to the enemy. The only hope for getting him back lies with Zoro and Sanji, but can they learn to work together in time to save the little reindeer?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 2! Shoot it into the groggy ring!

programme.title: Sanji and Zoro take a beating at the hands of the Groggy Monsters, but they won’t give up the fight. With a little luck – and some teamwork – they’ll emerge victorious from round two of the Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A barrage of red cards in groggy ring!

programme.title: Round three of the Davy Back Fight is a rip roaring roller derby! Chopper’s fate still hangs in the balance, and the Straw Hats have a huge problem: Luffy doesn’t know how to skate!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Davy Back Fight sprints toward a sensational finish, the Straw Hats find themselves on the brink of defeat! Luffy’s finally managed to stay on his skates, but the Foxy Pirates are notorious cheaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A seriously heated race! Into the final round!

programme.title: The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A devious game of dodge ball costs the Straw Hats their archaeologist. Now, they’ll have to win an unusual uphill race to reclaim Robin and avoid losing another crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown on the cliff! Red light, green light!

programme.title: Robin and Chopper have both been lost to the Foxy Pirates, and there’s only one match remaining in the Davy Back Fight! Luffy’s got a plan to get his mates back, but failure would mean the end of the Straw Hats forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The captains square off! The final combat round!

programme.title: Luffy and Captain Foxy go toe-to-toe in a brutal battle waged aboard a booby-trapped boat. Luffy is fighting for his crew, but Captain Foxy’s dirty tricks have him on the ropes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full-blast slow-slow onslaught vs. Invulnerable luffy

programme.title: Luffy’s epic battle with Captain Foxy reaches its riveting end, and a very old man with a very tall horse reunites with a face from very long ago.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic, heated combat! The fateful final conclusion

programme.title: When Luffy and his mates lose their memory, Robin is the only Straw Hat who can remember their adventures together. Can she recover their recollections before the crew splits up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Was it lost? Stolen? Who are you?

programme.title: Robin tries to hold the crew together while unraveling the mystery of the missing memories. Meanwhile, Nami and Zoro flashback to painful moments from their pasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious boy with a horn and robin's deduction!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally discover the culprit behind their memory loss, but they’ve got bigger problems. The mysterious thief is determined to pit Zoro and Luffy against each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Now, let's get back our memories! The pirate crew lands on the island!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he’s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally regain their memories, but a much larger challenge looms on the horizon. The mysterious thief is about to transform into something even more powerful!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The last counterattack by the memory thief who reveals his true colors!

programme.title: A terrible storm leads to another run in with the devious Captain Foxy! When Luffy makes the dangerous decision to help his old foe, it could spell disaster for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and his mates must survive another outrageous battle aboard Captain Foxy’s booby-trapped boat, and even if they survive, something far worse awaits them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The guy who's the closest to invincible? And the most dangerous man!

programme.title: The Straw Hats take time out to help a group of hungry castaways, but trouble looms on the horizon. An icy marine adversary is out to track down Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Navy headquarters admiral aokiji! The ferocity of an ultimate powerhouse!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp work feverishly to save Robin from her icy tomb, and Luffy looks to settle the score with Admiral Aokiji in a man-to-man fight to the finish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel between rubber and ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!

programme.title: An encounter with a giant swimming frog leads to a close call with a seafaring train! Next up for the Straw Hats: drop anchor at a town full of water and seek out a shipwright!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The dashing sea train and the city of water, water seven!

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, and Nami take a wild ride through Water Seven in search of a shipwright. Meanwhile, Chopper and Robin get separated during their quest to find a bookstore!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the city on the water! Head to the mammoth shipbuilding plant!

programme.title: Zoro is attacked by thugs who want to cash in on his bounty, Sanji gets lost on a grocery shopping expedition, and three suitcases full of cash mysteriously go missing!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats’ missing money, but the Franky Family won’t give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Galley-la company! A grand sight: dock #1!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merry’s seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pirate abduction incident! A pirate ship that can only await her end!

programme.title: Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but they’ll need Luffy to even the odds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescuing our friend! Raid on the franky house!

programme.title: Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but he’s not at all happy to hear Luffy’s plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big fight under the moon! The pirate flag flutters with sorrow!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of two men's pride!

programme.title: The Straw Hat split is overshadowed by an assassination attempt on the mayor of Water Seven! Luffy is eager to investigate, but the leader of the Franky Family is about to reappear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Severe shock hits the city of water! Iceberg targeted!

programme.title: Luffy’s grudge match with Franky gets serious when his opponent turns out to be a cyborg! Iceberg awakes from his slumber only to hurl heinous accusations at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Iceberg’s strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.title: The citizens of Water Seven search for the Straw Hats and a devastating storm threatens to sink the city. Chopper and Sanji pick up Robin’s trail, but they aren’t prepared for what they’ll find.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: Usopp prepares to ride out the storm aboard the Going Merry, Franky hatches a plan to force Luffy into a rematch, and the Straw Hats set out to uncover Robin’s dark secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture robin! The determination of the straw hats!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Men in Black, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two top secret agents (Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones) are on a mission of policing alien activities on planet Earth. The Men in Black's current assignment: to stop an intergalactic terrorist from making Earth his next victim.

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Valley Of Fire, (1951, Western)
